Text.content:
To learn defining a content type, create another content type named ExampleContentV2 (example-content-v2) with the resource types app as explained above. Add another element named Date of type OpenCmsDateTime at the second position of the <xsd:sequence>. Further, delete the field named Image from the sequence. As an experiment, completely delete the <resourcebundles> and the <FieldSettings> element the resource types app did insert into the <xsd:appinfo> element.

Open the explorer, click on the wand icon, select "All" in the select box, and choose Example content V2.

This will create a new example content under /sites/examples/.content/example-content/example-content-v2-0001.xml.

Clicking on this file will open the form editor.
